Storytelling: Another way to listen to music would be through storytelling. People could create stories and use music to enhance the story and make it more engaging.
Dancing: Dancing is a great way to listen to music and enjoy it. People could gather and dance to live music or recorded music.
Karaoke: Karaoke is a fun way to listen to music and enjoy it with friends. People could sing along to recorded music and have a good time.
Musical performances: People could attend musical performances, such as concerts and shows, to listen to live music.
Music therapy: Music therapy is a way to use music to improve mental and physical health. People could listen to music as part of their therapy sessions.
